trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger looks beseechingly in your direction, fear in his eyes.

TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_SEQ_01<tab>Rumors of a primal sighting in the Shroud have Urianger gravely concerned, and he would have you ascertain its identity. First, you are to seek the counsel of Bowlord Lewin.
TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_SEQ_02<tab>Bowlord Lewin bids you welcome and expresses his gratitude for your aid in the investigation of the primal.
TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Lewin at the Seat of the First Bow.
TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_URIANGER_000_000<tab>Friend to the dawn, hear my plea. Tidings most ominous arrive from Gridania─a primal walketh the Shroud.
TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_URIANGER_000_001<tab>Those who have borne the eldritch spirit witness─and returned to tell the tale─avow that ne'er before have they seen its like.

TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_URIANGER_000_002<tab>The Gods' Quiver doth investigate as we speak, and meseems Bowlord Lewin would welcome a capable adventurer's helping hand. Pray hie thee to the Seat of the First Bow and shine thy light upon the matter.
TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_LEWIN_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. I have heard much of your deeds in recent days.
TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_LEWIN_000_011<tab>You come to lend your strength to the primal investigation, yes? Your aid is most welcome.
TEXT_GAIUSC607_01007_SYSTEM_EVENTAREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>Proceed to the Seat of the First Bow?
